title: Ground News - Barcelona's reservoirs only have 15 percent water, and the authorities are calling for savings.
text: The reservoirs in Catalonia are significantly below normal levels for this time of year, with most having only 15% water, considered the worst Summary by SIC Notícias drought ever in the region. 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right [] SIC Notícias Barcelona's reservoirs only have 15 percent water, and the authorities are calling for savings. The reservoirs in Catalonia are significantly below normal levels for this time of year, with most having only 15% water, considered the worst drought ever in the region. 1 hour agoRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
